title: Nilavedhu Karaiedhu Lyrics Kadugu
stanzas:
Nilavedhu karai edhu
azhagedhu kurai edhu
evanadhu ezhudhiyathu

azhuthidum thuligalil
kanam kandu ranam solla
manam ingu pazhagiyadhu.

Nilavedhu karai edhu
azhagedhu kurai edhu
evanadhu ezhudhiyathu

azhuthidum thuligalil
kanam kandu ranam solla
manam ingu pazhagiyadhu.

Nyaayam.. aniyaayam
adhu naalum maaraadhu.
kuttram.. adhan aazham
adhai sattangal kooraadhu

kaayam.. thanakkendraal
avan kaththal thaanagaadhu
kaayam.. pirarkkendraal
avan kaadhugal kaetkaadhu.

paavam adhil siridhenna
thunbam adhil peridhenna
yaarai kaetpaayo..

Nilavedhu karai edhu
azhagedhu kurai edhu
evanadhu ezhudhiyathu

azhuthidum thuligalil
kanam kandu ranam solla
manam ingu pazhagiyadhu.
